com.noelios.restlet.util
Class LogFileHandler

java.lang.Object
  java.util.logging.Handler
      java.util.logging.StreamHandler
          java.util.logging.FileHandler
              com.noelios.restlet.util.LogFileHandler

public class LogFileHandler
extends FileHandler

Log file handler that uses the com.noelios.restlet.util.LogFormatter by default. Also useful in configuration files to differentiate from the java.util.logging.FileHandler.
